channel.title: eth on Smart Contract Stack - Weekly Crypto, NFT, Blockchain Digest
channel.description: Recent content in eth on Smart Contract Stack - Weekly Crypto, NFT, Blockchain Digest

item.title: Week 18 - 2023
item.content:
news

üê¶ view tweet (twitter.com) - Introducing Blend: the Peer-to-Peer Perpetual Lending Protocol for NFTs. { #lending #nft }

The Kingdom Of Bhutan Has Been Quietly Mining Bitcoin For Years (forbes.com) | [üí¨ discussion] - The Himalayan kingdom confirmed it has been running a bitcoin mining operation as mystery surrounds the scale of its earlier cryptocurrency investments. { #bitcoin #mining }

Cryptoverse: Digital coins lure inflation-weary Argentines and Turks | Reuters (reuters.com) - Can inherently volatile cryptocurrencies become safe-havens? Apparently they can in some parts of the world, such as Argentina and Turkey, where soaring prices and tumbling local currencies have forced people to seek refuge in digital coins. { #lira #peso }

The DAME Tax: Making Cryptominers Pay for Costs They Impose on Others | CEA | The White House (whitehouse.gov) - 30% tax on compute used to mine digital assets { #tax }

Ex-OpenSea manager convicted in NFT insider trading case | Reuters (reuters.com) - A former product manager at OpenSea, the world’s largest marketplace for non-fungible tokens (NFTs), was convicted on Wednesday of fraud and money laundering for using inside knowledge of which assets would be featured on its home page to trade NFTs. { #fraud #nft }

U.S. Court Orders SEC to Respond to Coinbase’s Allegations Within 10 Days (coindesk.com) | [[üí¨ discussion](Coinbase last week argued the SEC is providing insufficient regulatory guidance for U.S. companies operating in the crypto sector)] - Coinbase last week argued the SEC is providing insufficient regulatory guidance for U.S. companies operating in the crypto sector { #sec #coinbase }

Stripe expands access to its crypto onramp with a new hosted option (stripe.com) - Web3 companies can now direct customers to a Stripe-hosted onramp to buy cryptocurrencies. { #web3 #onramp }

tool

GitHub - Mrtenz/FindETH: A tool to help you find your lost Ethereum address, Ether or tokens, by searching through a bunch of derivation paths (github.com) - A tool to help you find your lost Ethereum address, Ether or tokens, by searching through a bunch of derivation paths { #eth }

De.Fi - DeFi Investing & Yield Farming Platform (de.fi) - Scan any smart contract, token or NFT. Find out about threats and vulnerabilities with our in-depth analysis before you invest. { #defi }

OpenChain (openchain.xyz) - Look up unknown function selectors or event topics, or contribute your own data for others to use | Want to dig deep into a EVM-compatible transaction? This easy-to-use transaction tracer is for you. { #tx #abi }

Chain Broker - Discover The Latest Information on Crypto Projects Funding (chainbroker.io) - Chain Broker is a platform for the latest information on crypto projects funding. We include all information on investors and conditions for private and public funding. Including: Seed, Private, Strategic an IDO/IEO Rounds. { #vc #investor }

cookbook.dev (cookbook.dev) - Find any smart contract, Build your project faster. Find smart contracts, solidity libraries, and discover protocols. { #solidity #dev }

Magic | Web3 Auth & Key Management SDKs | Magic (magic.link) - Instant Web3 wallets for your customers. Magic gives developers the tools to make adoption frictionless, secure, and non-custodial. No downloads. No passwords. No seed phrases. 20M users. { #wallet #web3 }

misc

Coinbase exec uses ChatGPT ‚Äòjailbreak‚Äô to get odds on wild crypto scenarios (cointelegraph.com) - According to ChatGPT, there‚Äôs a 15% chance that Bitcoin will ‚Äúfade to irrelevancy,‚Äù with prices falling 99.99% by 2035. { #chatgpt #bitcoin }

How the War on Crypto Triggered a Banking Crisis | WEB OF DEBT BLOG (ellenbrown.com) - by Ellen Brown { #regulation }

Ethereum 3.0 Roadmap | Zuzalu Presentation Recording (glass.xyz) - The Ethereum 3.0 roadmap promises to introduce major upgrades and changes to the network, including the introduction of proof-of-stake consensus mechanism, sharding, and much more. These upgrades will help to improve scalability, security, and performance, allowing the platform to handle more transactions and users than ever before.

One click Checkout buttons for Web3 - by Joel John (decentralised.co) - Scaling to a billion users. { #wallet #web3 }

(dune.com) - ETH Flow From The Ethereum Foundation { #chart }
